thread.title: Murphy Oil Corporation to Host First Quarter 2018 Conference Call and Webcast

author: cnbc.com
title: Murphy Oil Corporation to Host First Quarter 2018 Conference Call and Webcast

organizations.name: murphy oil corporation murphy oil corporation

text:
EL DORADO, Ark.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Murphy Oil Corporation (NYSE:MUR) today announced it will release first quarter 2018 earnings after market close on Wednesday, May 2, 2018. The company will host a conference call and webcast for investors and analysts beginning at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time (ET), on Thursday, May 3, 2018.
A webcast link and related presentation material will be accessible on the Investors page of the company’s website at http://ir.murphyoilcorp.com .
Date: Thursday, May 3, 2018
Time: 11:00 a.m. ET
Toll Free Dial in: 888-886-7786
Conference ID: 18948426
ABOUT MURPHY OIL CORPORATION
Murphy Oil Corporation is a global independent oil and natural gas exploration and production company. The company’s diverse resource base includes offshore production in Southeast Asia, Canada and Gulf of Mexico, as well as North America onshore plays in the Eagle Ford Shale, Kaybob Duvernay and Montney. Additional information can be found on the company’s website at http://www.murphyoilcorp.com
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180403006512/en/
Murphy Oil Corporation
